name: End of a World
description:
Darkness fades, a wounded girl in a devastated world, clinging to her life, falling to her knees, her senses fade.
A sudden awakening. Was it all a bad dream? An echo from another time? Whatever it was, it bears signs of something truly terrifying...

This little, slightly interactive game, tells a story about love, loss and pain in a world quite similar to ours. It's an emotional journey, from beginning to end
and I advise having something to hug close by when the curtain falls and the game ends.
